title: 107_hr1390
content: Child Care Worker Incentive Act of 2001 - Amends the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to establish a national child care provider scholarship program. Requires: (1) the scholarship applicant's demonstrated commitment to a child care career, (2) cost sharing by the applicant and employer. And (3) the employer's agreement to provide increased financial incentives to the employee upon completion of the education or training.
